title: Origami: the folding papers of Japan
brief_description: Japanese children demonstrate the ancient art of origami, decorative paper folding. Many beautiful and complex designs can be created by working iwth a simple square of paper. Flowers, animals, birds and other things appear magically from the dextrous fingers of the children.
